text: Abdelmajid Tlemçani (30 November 1937 – 8 July 2020) was a Tunisian footballer. Tlemçani played for Espérance Sportive de Tunis and the Tunisian national team. He is the father of footballer Zied Tlemçani. Tlemçani scored the highest number of goals in the Tunisian League. Tlemçani died on 8 July 2020, aged 82. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Tunisian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Tunis
title: Abdelmajid Tlemçani
